thread.title: Ronaldo warns girlfriend after she poses with other man
thread.title_full: Ronaldo warns girlfriend after she poses with other man

title: Ronaldo warns girlfriend after she poses with other man
text:
Ronaldo warns girlfriend after she poses with other man Georgina Rodriguez poses with Callado. (Getty Images) Real Madrid star Cristiano Ronaldo has taken issue with a photo of his girlfriend posted on social media with another man. Source: Tweet 
Ronaldo commented on the photo on Alvaro Callado's Instagram page featuring his girlfriend Georgina Rodriguez. 
Callado and Rodriguez, 22, are seen posing together in the image, leading to a number of people tagging the Portugal captain in their comments on the photo. 
Ronaldo then responded with the word 'Cuidado' meaning 'careful' or 'caution'. 
Luckily for Callado the response was accompanied by three laughing emojis, making it apparent that the 32 year-old wasn't taking the photo too seriously. 
Ronaldo's comment on Callado's Instagram (2nd comment down). Ronaldo's comment on Callado's Instagram (2nd comment down). 
Rodriguez and Collado are former colleagues at fashion label Gucci, with the image suggesting they have maintained a close friendship since she started dating the Real Madrid attacker in November. 
Ronaldo poses with his girlfriend Georgina Rodriguez after receiving The Best FIFA Football Award in January. Vice president of Serbian club defends racist abuse of Brazilian player The vice-president of Serbian club FK Rad Beograd, whose fans racially abused rival player Everton Luiz, has defended her team and launched a vile attack on the player saying he should: “Go back to Brazil and show your dark fingers to them”.
